patthana8.27:4.1: Naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.27:4.2: Naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.27:4.3: Naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.27:5.1: Naaganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.27:6.1: Naganthaniyañca naaganthaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.27:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
